item.title: Segmentation: Metrics and Losses in 40 Easy Steps
item.description: Semantic segmentation is a crucial component of visual perception, with high demand in both low-latency and precision-focused applications. I have decided to create an overview of the current state of this task. The first part contains a brief overview of various approaches to evaluating segmentation model performance. Choosing the right set of metrics is often the first step when developing a segmentation system. Understanding the common performance measurements helps clarify the task at hand and provides insights into the challenges that arise when creating such a system.
